venue.name: Mendizorrotza Stadium
venue.address: Paseo de Cervantes, s/n, 01007 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain

Presidential Box.Description: Exclusive seating area offering the best view and luxury experience.
Presidential Box.View_Quality: Central view from the best vantage point, exceptionally immersive.
Presidential Box.Unique_Features: Luxury seating, highest level of privacy and exclusivity.
Presidential Box.Accessibility: VIP access with personal assistance, best access routes.
Presidential Box.Special_Perks: Gourmet dining options, meet-and-greet opportunities with players.

VIP Seats.Description: Premium seats with excellent pitch views and exclusive benefits.
VIP Seats.View_Quality: Unmatched side views, close to the action.
VIP Seats.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating, complimentary snacks and beverages.
VIP Seats.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, special events invitations.

Grandstand.Description: Elevated side views for an optimal viewing experience.
Grandstand.View_Quality: Excellent perspective of the entire pitch, clear line of sight.
Grandstand.Unique_Features: Good balance of view quality and ticket price.
Grandstand.Accessibility: Easy access, available facilities for guests with disabilities.
Grandstand.Special_Perks: A popular choice among regular fans for its great value.

General Admission.Description: Affordable tickets providing access to vibrant atmosphere areas.
General Admission.View_Quality: Dynamic view of the game, engaging fan experience.
General Admission.Unique_Features: Access to the heart of the fan sections, lively atmosphere.
General Admission.Accessibility: Standard access, dedicated areas for wheelchair users.
General Admission.Special_Perks: Part of the passionate fan base, traditional stadium experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Sagartoki
restaurants_bars.description: Award-winning restaurant known for its innovative pintxos and local cuisine, offering a modern dining experience in the heart of Vitoria-Gasteiz.

restaurants_bars.name: El Clarete
restaurants_bars.description: A cozy wine bar that also serves a variety of traditional and modern tapas, located in the medieval quarter of the city.

restaurants_bars.name: Restaurante Ikea
restaurants_bars.description: A family-run restaurant offering classic Basque dishes in a welcoming atmosphere, perfect for experiencing local cuisine.

restaurants_bars.name: PerretxiCo
restaurants_bars.description: Popular for its creative pintxos and casual dining, this restaurant is a favorite among locals for its friendly service and quality food.

restaurants_bars.name: Zaldiaran
restaurants_bars.description: An esteemed restaurant with a Michelin star, offering sophisticated Basque cuisine in an elegant setting.

restaurants_bars.name: The Bost
restaurants_bars.address: Calle San Antonio, 3, 01005 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: Known for its relaxed ambiance and delicious local fare, this gastropub offers a wide selection of beers and wines along with inventive dishes.

accommodations.name: Hotel Silken Ciudad de Vitoria
accommodations.address: Portal de Castilla, 8, 01008 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
accommodations.description: Conveniently located near the city center, this hotel offers modern accommodations and amenities, making it a great base for exploring Vitoria-Gasteiz and attending Deportivo Alavés matches.

accommodations.name: NH Canciller Ayala Vitoria
accommodations.address: Ramón y Cajal, 5, 01007 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
accommodations.description: Situated in the heart of the city, this hotel boasts views of the Cathedral, the Basque Parliament, and Florida Park, along with easy access to Mendizorrotza Stadium.

accommodations.name: AC Hotel General Álava
accommodations.description: This stylish hotel is centrally located in Vitoria-Gasteiz, offering comfortable rooms and excellent service, ideal for fans visiting for a football game.

accommodations.name: Sercotel Boulevard Vitoria-Gasteiz
accommodations.description: Offering modern and spacious accommodations, this hotel is a bit further from the city center but provides easy access to the Mendizorrotza Stadium.

accommodations.name: Gran Hotel Lakua
accommodations.description: Located on the outskirts of Vitoria, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodations and amenities, including a spa and restaurant, perfect for a relaxing stay.

accommodations.name: Hotel Zenit Jardines de Uleta Suites
accommodations.description: This hotel features spacious suite accommodations and a garden area, located close to the city's green belt, offering a peaceful and comfortable stay.

tourist_attractions.name: Catedral de Santa María
tourist_attractions.address: Plaza de la Catedral, s/n, 01001 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A Gothic cathedral known for its open worksite, offering guided tours that explore its architecture and ongoing restoration efforts.

tourist_attractions.name: Basque Museum of Contemporary Art - Artium
tourist_attractions.description: A modern museum featuring Basque and Spanish contemporary art, with rotating exhibitions and a permanent collection.

tourist_attractions.name: Parque de la Florida
tourist_attractions.address: Paseo de la Florida, s/n, 01005 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A beautiful park in the city center, known for its English-style garden, statues, and a wide variety of plant species.

tourist_attractions.name: Medieval Walls
tourist_attractions.address: Calle Siervas de Jesús, s/n, 01001 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Historic walls that once protected the city, offering guided tours and panoramic views from the walkway along the top.

tourist_attractions.name: Anillo Verde
tourist_attractions.description: A green belt that surrounds the city, consisting of parks and recreation areas, ideal for walking, cycling, and enjoying nature.

tourist_attractions.name: Plaza de la Virgen Blanca
tourist_attractions.address: Plaza de la Virgen Blanca, s/n, 01001 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: The main square of the city, surrounded by historic buildings and a popular meeting place for locals and tourists alike.

team_related_activities.name: Deportivo Alavés Official Store at Mendizorrotza
team_related_activities.address: Paseo Cervantes, s/n, 01007 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Deportivo Alavés merchandise, offering a wide range of team apparel and accessories right at the Mendizorrotza Stadium.

team_related_activities.name: Deportivo Alavés Match Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: Paseo Cervantes, s/n, 01007 Vitoria-Gasteiz, Álava, Spain
team_related_activities.description: Attend a Deportivo Alavés game at the iconic Mendizorrotza Stadium to experience the passion and atmosphere of one of La Liga's teams.

team_related_activities.name: Deportivo Alavés Football Camp
team_related_activities.description: Football camps for young fans and aspiring players, offering coaching and training in the sport under the guidance of Deportivo Alavés professionals.

team_related_activities.name: Meet & Greet with Deportivo Alavés Players
team_related_activities.description: Special events organized for fans to meet their favorite Deportivo Alavés players, get autographs, and take photos.

team_related_activities.name: Deportivo Alavés Community Outreach Programs
team_related_activities.address: Various community centers and schools in Vitoria-Gasteiz
team_related_activities.description: Community programs and initiatives led by Deportivo Alavés, promoting sportsmanship, teamwork, and football among youth in Vitoria-Gasteiz.

options.description: Vitoria-Gasteiz's city bus network offers convenient access to Mendizorrotza Stadium, with several lines stopping near the stadium. This provides easy access for visitors coming to see a match or visit the team store.
options.directions: Check the Tuvisa website for bus schedules, routes, and real-time updates.

options.description: The Vitoria-Gasteiz tram system provides a quick and efficient way to reach the stadium, with the 'Florida' tram stop located nearby, offering direct connections to various parts of the city.
options.directions: For directions and detailed tram schedules, visit the Euskotren website or use their mobile app.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections for Deportivo Alavés games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable ticketing partner offering tickets for various events, including Deportivo Alavés games, within Spain.

best_places_to_buy.name: Resale Platforms
best_places_to_buy.description: Check reputable resale platforms for tickets, especially for sold-out games. Ensure the platform offers buyer protection and is authorized to sell Deportivo Alavés tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for family packages or group discounts for savings. Mid-week games may offer lower prices compared to weekend games. Sign up for the team's newsletter for promotional deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be cautious of offers that seem too good to be true, and verify the authenticity of tickets when buying from resale sites.
